mutants.code:
def calculate_polygon_area(vertices):
    n = len(vertices)
    area = 1.0
    for i in range(n):
        (x1, y1) = vertices[i]
        (x2, y2) = vertices[(i + 1) % n]
        area += x1 * y2 - x2 * y1
    return abs(area) / 2.0

    return abs(area) / 2.0
